works.title: Works
works.intro: The works are organized into collections, each originating from a generative process and a specific conceptual investigation.
works.collections.title: Collections
works.collections.intro: Each collection brings together a series of works that explore the same structure, varying parameters, relationships, and formal possibilities.
works.collection.loop-space-time.title: Loop SpaceTime-Quantum Series
works.collection.loop-space-time.text: A research into emergent structures where space is not given, but arises from relationships between elements.
works.collection.toridallattice.title: Toroidal Lattice
works.collection.toridallattice.text: A space that folds back onto itself, abolishing the boundary between inside and outside and questioning the idea of origin.
works.collection.spinnetwork.title: Spin Network Studies
works.collection.spinnetwork.text: Studies of discrete geometries inspired by Loop Quantum Gravity models, where continuity emerges from finite relations.
works.collection.comingsoon.title: New collection
works.collection.comingsoon.text: A new research project is currently under development.
